thumb.title: ヴァシストの神聖な祭りの夜２
thumb.description: [Verse] Floating lanterns in the sky Whispering secrets that we hide Mellotron dreams of a lullaby Distorted echoes far and wide [Verse 2] Glimmering moon paints the air Flutes weave tales of what was there In the forest lost in prayer Sacred lights in cosmic flare [Chorus] ヴァシストの神聖な祭りの夜 Wishes dance on beams of light Stars align in boundless blur Heaven’s gate opens tonight [Verse 3] Mystic shadows on the groundVoices lost but now are found In this sanctuary's sound Rhythms turn the world around [Bridge] Dreamscapes twist in swirling haze Tender faces lost in maze Time dissolves in phantom blaze Endless twilight in a daze [Verse 4] Harmony beneath the veil Mysteries within we'll sail Through otherworldly tale Where heart and spirit never fail
